type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.component.ModuleComponentSelector
type.description:
Criteria for selecting a component instance that is available as a module version.
@since 1.10

method.name: getGroup
getVersion
method.description:
The version of the module to select the component from.

returns:Module version

method.name: getModule
method.description:
The name of the module to select the component from.

returns:Module name

property.description:
The version of the module to select the component from.

returns:Module version

property.name: group
module
property.description:
